article.title: Lockheed Receives Enhanced Radar Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin, Mission System and Sensors, Liverpool, New York, was awarded a $166,044,028 firm-fixed-price contract enhanced AN/TPQ-36 radars, including spares, testing, and training materials. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
